description: T.1 Oak - Remove 3 lowest lateral limbs extending over the garden. Branches of no greater diameter than 20cm to be removed and to be taken back to the branch collar at the trunk. 2-3m Lateral reduction and reshape of upper canopy over neigbouring property to reduce weight on side of lean.T.2 Oak (within G.2) - Remove 3 lowest lateral limbs extending over the garden. Branches of no greater diameter than 20cm to be removed and to be taken back to the branch collar at the trunk.  2-3m Lateral reduction and reshape of upper canopy over neigbouring property to reduce weight on side of lean. Also remove wooden timber support bolted between T.2 and adjacent Cypress and fell the cypress for health and safety reasons.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
